com.twiddles.ganesha.functionality
Interface RDFContainer

All Known Subinterfaces:
RDFAlt, RDFBag, RDFSeq
All Known Implementing Classes:
JenaAlt, JenaBag, JenaContainerAdaptor, JenaSeq
public interface RDFContainer

Interface for querying and modifying RDF containers. A container is really just a special kind of anonymous resource with an additional implied meaning. There are 3 types of containers: bags, sequences and alternatives.

A bag represents an unordered set of properties. A sequence represents properties that have a particular order. A set of alternatives is essentially a bag, except that one property is consdered the default.

This interface should not be implemented directly, instead use the appropriate sub-interface.

See Also:
RDFBag, RDFSeq, RDFAlt

Returns the number of objects in the container.

getObject

RDFObject getObject(int index)
Retrieves the object at the specified index in this container.

Returns:
objects in this container

addObject

void addObject(RDFObject object)
Inserts a new object into this container. If this is a SEQ the object will be added at the end, if it is a ALT the new object will not be made default.

Parameters:
object - the object to insert

removeObject

void removeObject(int index)
Removes the object at the specified position from the container.

Parameters:
index - the index of the element to be deleted.

setObjectAt

void setObjectAt(int index,
                 RDFObject object)
Swaps the object at the given index with the given new object.

Parameters:
index - the index of the old object
object - the new object to be placed at that index

delete

void delete()
Deletes this container.

getURI

java.lang.String getURI()
Returns the URI of this container. Since containers are really just resources with a special rdf:type property they may have a URI. Unless they are anonymous, then they are assigned a unique ID.

Returns:
this resource's URI
See Also:
isAnonymous()

isAnonymous

boolean isAnonymous()
Checks if this is an anonymous container.

Returns:
if anonymous or not
